pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cachy#####.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/sdispater/cachy.png :alt: Cachy Build status :target: https://travis-ci.org/sdispater/cachyCachy provides a simple yet effective caching library.The full documentation is available here: http://cachy.readthedocs.orgResources=========* `Documentation <http://cachy.readthedocs.org>`_* `Issue Tracker <https://github.com/sdispater/cachy/issues>`_
